description: The practice will be banned for under-18s, but critics have called for the age limit to be raised.
title: Germany passes law banning 'gay conversion therapy' for minors
title_page: Germany passes law banning 'gay conversion therapy' for minors - BBC News
maintext: "They should feel strengthened when the state, when society, when Parliament makes it clear: we do not want that in this country," said Mr Spahn, who is gay himself.
